name: Melon Game (Niker107)
description: "In a not very well-known game called 'Half-Life 2,' there exists a watermelon model. But, you see, this is no ordinary 3D model. In-fact, it is quite special - it only uses a tiny portion of the image provided for it, and everything else is pitch black, as if the melon is left to swim in emptiness... oh to live on that watermelon island, floating amongst the void..."
